nodes.text: A Balnab male lived on the planet Balnab during the time of the Clone Wars.

This Balnab lived on the planet Balnab when protocol droid C-3PO and astromech droid R2-D2 landed on it during the Battle of Patitite Pattuna. This Balnab and two others rode Tee-muss and were out hinting for Hesten when they ran into the two droids and captured them. The Balnabs did not know what the two were so they decided to take them to their leader, Albee Dewaw.
After C-3PO and R2-D2 revealed the true identity of Albee Dewaw, this Balnab and the rest of the villagers destroyed the DUM-series pit droids and freed themselves from being slaves.
